import {Component, EventEmitter, Input, OnInit, Output} from '@angular/core'; import {FormControl, FormGroup} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-dialog-window', templateUrl: './dialog-window.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dialog-window.component.css'] }) export class DialogWindowComponent implements OnInit{ @Output() protected isOpen: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); dateControl = new FormControl(); protected formPost!: FormGroup; protected formDoubleDate!: FormGroup; protected formSingleDate!: FormGroup; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { this.formPost = new FormGroup({ newPost: new FormControl(), newSalary: new FormControl(), }) this.formDoubleDate = new FormGroup({ endDate: new FormControl(), }) } protected manageDialog() { this.isOpen.emit(false); } submit(){ } }
